body_html: I don't think the issue that @davek44 is raising is gate-specific initialization, but rather just initialization period. LSTMCell allows the user to pass an initializer (used for all gates), but the other types of cells do not (e.g. GRUs).
body_text: I don't think the issue that @davek44 is raising is gate-specific initialization, but rather just initialization period. LSTMCell allows the user to pass an initializer (used for all gates), but the other types of cells do not (e.g. GRUs).
body: I don't think the issue that @davek44 is raising is gate-specific initialization, but rather just initialization period. LSTMCell allows the user to pass an initializer (used for all gates), but the other types of cells do not (e.g. GRUs).
